inclusion.criterion: postmenopausal women aged greater than or equal to 40 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of breast cancer stages I-IIIA
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: planned therapy for the treatment group must include aromatase inhibitors using third generation non-steroidal aromatase inhibitors, anastrozole or letrozole
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: bone mineral density measurement must range from normal to osteopenia (T-scores between +2.0/-2.0)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: must be ambulatory willing and able to provide informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: no current use of medications affecting bone metabolism, namely: estrogen, raloxifene, tamoxifen, bisphosphonates, GnRH analogues, glucocorticoids of at least 5 mg daily for 1 month or more, anabolic steroids and dilantin
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: no evidence of diseases known to interfere with bone metabolism, such as hyperparathyroidism, hyperthyroidism, osteomalacia, chronic liver disease, renal failure, hypercortisolism, malabsorption, and immobilization
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: no current alcohol or tobacco abuse
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and will be started on Bisphosphonate as first-line therapy.
